column1: VILLA ANTINORI ROSSO *14300*Villa Antinori Tosacana is deep ruby red in color. Its nose is intense and complex defined by notes of wild berries, blue berrie sand blackcurrants, and notes of toasted hazelnuts, spices and vanilla. A full-bodied palate is well rounded with supple velvety tannins and along savory finish.
CIAMPOLETO ROSSO DI MONTALCINO DOC *12000*From Italy's renowned Montalcino region, it has a robust taste profile features ripe cherry, plum, and earthy notes, complemented by firm tannins.
NOBODYS SAUVIGNON BLANC *10450*Intense sauvignon with tropical fruit, passionfruit, guava, pineapple, lemongrass and green capsicum flavours.
CHATEAU DE FONTILLE ROUGE PASSION BORDEAUX AOC *9900*Grown at Fontenille since the 13th century. This wine has a ruby colour, this is an elegant wine with lingering berry fruit notes.

MONTGRAS CAB SAUVIGNON*8250*From Chile's Colchagua Valley, it showcases a bold and expressive character of the unique terroir of the valley. It has a rich profile with ripe blackberry, cassis, and dark chocolate notes.

SANTA JULIA MALBEC*7700*Deep red violet with blue hues. Very aromatic, with great presence of ripe red fruits typical of the variety and floral notes of violets. The aromas provided by the oak aging are integrated and manifest in notes of tobacco,leather and spices.

DE MARTINO ESTATE CHARDONNAY*7700*"Pale yellow straw color. Fresh aromas of ripe citrus and peach, lead to a soft textured, medium bodied palate. The ripe citrus fruit character is balanced by fresh acidity and moderate alcohol with a lingering finish."

ZONIN MONTEPULCIANO DABRUZZO DOC*7700*Zonin is a historic benchmark of Italian wineries, located in the heart of Veneto, at the foot of the Lessini mountains. Montepulciano d'Abruzzo is medium-bodied, dry, well-balanced, mellow and berry.
BLACK TOWER PINOT NOIR *7700*Tasty German red wine made from the Pinot Noir grape, which is called Dornfelder in Germany, with some bright cherry notes and good acidity

BLACK TOWER RIESLING *7250*From Germany's renowned Rheinhessen region, it has a crisp taste profile featuring vibrant notes of ripe peach, citrus zest, and honey, balanced by a refreshing acidity and a hint of minerality
MANNARA PINOT GRIGIO *7150*A dry, easy drinking Sicilian white with a floral aroma and flavours of citrus, apple, pear, vanilla and almonds.

GRAN SELLO TEMPRANILLO SYRAH*6600*From Spain's esteemed Castilla-La Mancha region, it presents a bold taste profile with ripe blackberry, plum, and hints of spice, marrying the rich fruitiness of Tempranillo with the peppery allure of Syrah.
CAMPO VIEJO RIOJA BLANCO (SPAIN)*6000*Floral, fresh and fragrant wine.Citrus fruit flavour enhances the Viura’s floral notes while complementing its white fruit.
CAMPO VIEJO RIOJA TEMPRANILLO (SPAIN)*6000*Full bodied,balanced by gentle acidity,ripe tannin,hints of violet, lavender, vanilla, cedar and spice.

DOM PERIGNON *74800*Hailing from the Champagne region, it boasts of a complex taste profile with notes of citrus, toasted brioche, and delicate minerality, culminating in a refined and luxurious experience.
ZONIN PROSECCO BRUT*7700*Attractively intense very fruity and aromatic, with hints of rose and cardamom. Very well-balanced, pleasant notes of cherries
MOET & CHANDON BRUT*26500*From the Champagne region, it offers a vibrant taste with notes of green apple, citrus, and a creamy finish, embodying elegance and celebration in every sip.
VILLA SANDI PROSECCO*7700*Fresh, markebly fruity taste with an agreeable elegance and harmonious finish
CHANDON BRUT*6600*Crisp, fresh, classic expression of California vineyards, signature green apple, pear and citrus notes precede a soft, dry finish.
